definition: A framework that complements the 7 Matrixes by assessing key dimensions of relational compatibility across emotional, physical, psychological, and spiritual layers.

domains.name: Resonance
domains.description: The emotional and energetic alignment you feel with someone, beyond logic or shared interests.

domains.name: Groundedness
domains.description: The ability to stay emotionally stable and centered, especially in conflict or emotional triggers.

domains.name: Confidence
domains.description: Inner security, self-trust, and the ability to express needs and take up space without ego.

domains.name: Looks / Attraction
domains.description: Physical attraction and chemistry, including how visually and energetically appealing someone feels to you.

domains.name: Physical Compatibility
domains.description: How well your touch, rhythm, intimacy, and physical presence align with each other.

domains.name: Relational Maturity
domains.description: Capacity for mutual growth, healthy communication, and emotional responsibility in a partnership.

domains.name: Timing
domains.description: Life alignment — whether you’re both in the right season of life to build something meaningful together.

domains.name: Cultural Fit
domains.description: Shared worldview, background, lifestyle, and ability to respect and integrate differences.

domains.name: Sexual Alignment
domains.description: Desire, polarity, and preferences in sexual connection — not just frequency but depth and play.

domains.name: Nervous System Compatibility
domains.description: How regulated you feel around the other person — calm, safe, energized, or dysregulated.

domains.name: Shadow Dynamics
domains.description: Unconscious triggers and projections — whether your wounds complement or compound each other.
